title: (x) narrow slab serif - Schmale Jonish/Carter Egyptian XCd {Mark S/Ignacio}
author: grant

comments.content:
I found this in _Alphabets & Other Signs_ by Rothstein and Gooding:   
   
 ![jonisch](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516141210im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/19707.jpg)   
   
They don't provide any more information about it, but it appears to match your sample. Looks like an old German face. No idea if it's available now. Perhaps they scanned it.

I found this sample in the Solotype Catalog (sorry, no more characters).   
   
 ![carter](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516141210im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/19715.gif)
Jameson, If you have a budget just hire Mark to create it for you. He'd probably do a better job in half the time of you scanning Marks page. Dan
